content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Stone furnace setup at position(x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position x1)
- Stone furnace (position x2)

### Coal and Iron Ore Processing
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position x1) with iron ore inserted
- Stone furnace (position x2) with iron ore inserted
- Stone furnace (position x1) with coal inserted
- Stone furnace (position x2) with coal inserted

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items into furnaces
- Ensure that the furnace is ready to accept items before attempting to insert. Check if the furnace has enough space for the items being inserted.

### Errors when extracting items from furnaces
- Make sure to check that the furnace has items available for extraction before attempting to extract them.

### Errors related to inventory updates
- Regularly monitor your inventory to ensure you are aware of the items available for crafting and processing. This will help avoid unnecessary harvesting or crafting actions.
